## October 17, 2020

```{r}
library(leaflet)
df <- data.frame( lat = c(1.3483),
                  lng = c(103.6831)
)

df %>% 
    leaflet() %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers(popup = "Nanyang Technological University")
```
